h1: 12 Cheque Rent on Any Property with Rently
paragraph: Stop searching for landlords who accept 12 cheque rent. With Rently, you can choose any home. We pay your landlord in full, so you can pay us back monthly.

faqs.answer: Rently pays your landlord the full annual rent upfront according to their preferred payment terms (1-6 cheques), while you repay Rently in 12 convenient monthly installments. This arrangement includes a transparent service fee that you can calculate using our online calculator. The process creates flexibility for you without changing how landlords receive their payment.
faqs.question: How does Rently's 12 cheque rent solution work?

faqs.answer: Yes, landlords accept Rently's payment arrangement because they still receive their preferred payment terms (1-6 cheques) upfront. From the landlord's perspective, nothing changes about how they collect rent. Rently handles the conversion from their preferred payment schedule to your monthly installments, making the property effectively available with 12 cheque rent terms for you while maintaining the landlord's payment preferences.
faqs.question: Do landlords accept Rently's payment arrangement?

faqs.answer: Rently's service fee varies based on your specific rental arrangement and lease terms. We pride ourselves on full transparency, which is why we provide a calculator on our website where you can input your rental details to see the exact service fee before proceeding. The fee covers the convenience of converting your annual rent into 12 monthly installments while the landlord receives their payment upfront.
faqs.question: How much is Rently's service fee for the 12 cheque option?

faqs.answer: Yes, Rently can optionally cover your security deposit as well, splitting it into manageable monthly installments alongside your rent payments. This means you won't need to pay a large security deposit upfront when moving in. At the end of your lease, you'll still receive the full deposit back from your landlord according to the terms of your lease agreement.
faqs.question: Can Rently help with my security deposit too?

faqs.answer: Rently is available in key locations across the UAE, primarily serving Dubai and Abu Dhabi. Our Rent Now, Pay Later solution helps tenants in these emirates convert traditional rental payment terms into convenient monthly installments. If you're looking for flexible 12 cheque rent options in the UAE, you can check your eligibility on our website or contact our team for specific coverage details.
